Package simu.model

Class ServicePoint

java.lang.Object
simu.model.ServicePoint
Direct Known Subclasses:
RestaurantServicePoint
public class ServicePoint extends Object
ServicePoint is the class for the service points in the simulation. The class is used to manage the service points and the customers in the service points.

      The event list for the service point.

  • Constructor Details

    • ServicePoint

      public ServicePoint(ContinuousGenerator generator, EventList eventList, EventType type, int rideCount)
      The constructor for the ServicePoint class. The constructor initializes the service point with the given parameters and sets the ride ID (service point ID) for the service point.
      Parameters:
      generator - The generator for the service point.
      eventList - The event list for the service point.
      type - The type of the scheduled event.
      rideCount - The number of rides in the simulation.

  • Method Details

    • getRideID

      public int getRideID()
      The method to get the ride ID of the service point.
      Returns:
      The ride ID of the service point.

    • addToQueue

      public void addToQueue(Customer a)
      The method to add a customer to the queue of the service point.
      Parameters:
      a - The customer to be added to the queue.

    • fetchFromQueue

      public Customer fetchFromQueue()
      The method to fetch a customer from the queue of the service point.
      Returns:
      The customer fetched from the queue.

    • beginService

      public void beginService()
      The method to begin a new service in the service point. The method starts a new service and the customer is in the queue during the service. Scheduled event is added to the event list at the end of the service time. Service time is sampled from the generator.

    • isReserved

      public boolean isReserved()
      The method to check if the service point is reserved.
      Returns:
      The boolean value for the reservation of the service point.

    • isInQueue

      public boolean isInQueue()
      The method to check if the service point has customers in the queue.
      Returns:
      The boolean value for the customers in the queue of the service point.

    • fetchFromCustomerList

      public Customer fetchFromCustomerList()
      The method to fetch a customer from the customer list of the service point.
      Returns:
      The customer fetched from the customer list.

    • getCustomerListSize

      public int getCustomerListSize()
      The method to get the size of the customer list of the service point.
      Returns:
      The size of the customer list.

    • getAverageServiceTime

      public double getAverageServiceTime()
      The method to get the average service time of the service point.
      Returns:
      The average service time of the service point.

    • addServiceTime

      public void addServiceTime(int servicePointID, double serviceTime)
      The method to add the service time of a customer to the service point.
      Parameters:
      servicePointID - The ID of the service point.
      serviceTime - The service time of the customer.

    • getAverageQueueTime

      public double getAverageQueueTime()
      The method to get the average queue time of the service point.
      Returns:
      The average queue time of the service point.

    • addQueueTime

      public void addQueueTime(Customer customer)
      The method to add the queue time of a customer to the service point.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer whose queue time is added to the service point.

    • incrementCustomerCounter

      The method to increment the customer counter of the service point.
